name.baseName: Mining of Rare Earth Oxides (REO);Rare Earth Oxides (REO);bastnaesite route;Rare Earth Elements (REE) containing ore
稀土氧化物开采;稀土氧化物;氟碳铈矿路线;含稀土元素矿石

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The REO mining process described is intended for the extraction of rare earth oxides from bastnaesite-containing ore in the Bayan Obo region, located in the Southern Provinces of China. The output from this process serves as a critical resource in various high-tech industries, including electronics, renewable energy technologies, and aerospace engineering. Specifically, the rare earth elements extracted are vital components in the manufacturing of permanent magnets, batteries, catalysts, and phosphors.
此描述的稀土氧化物(REO)开采过程旨在从位于中国南方省份白云鄂博地区含氟碳铈矿的矿石中提取稀土氧化物。该过程的产出是电子、可再生能源技术和航空航天工程等高科技行业中的关键资源。具体来说，提取的稀土元素是制造永磁体、电池、催化剂和荧光粉等产品的关键组件。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The study considered 15 different functional units corresponding to different RE metals. The assessment included three main RE production sites in China: REO production in Bayan Obo, Sichuan, and IACs. Primary data were collected for foreground production processes from Chinese and further international scientific literature, industry reports, government and industry surveys. The authors assumed a baseline for aqueous and gaseous emissions using national discharge standards for industry from the Chinese Ministry of

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 白云鄂博, 中国南方省份

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Because no primary mining data from Bayan Obo were available, LCI data in the studies (Sprecher, Arshi, Marx, Bailey (Classen et al., 2007)) are based on different data sources either from iron mining or in Althaus from phosphate rock mining. Main inputs are energy and blasting agent
由于没有白云鄂博的初级采矿数据，研究中的生命周期清单数据（Sprecher、Arshi、Marx、Bailey（Classen 等人，2007 年））基于不同的数据源，要么来自铁矿开采，要么来自 Althaus 的磷矿开采。主要投入是能源和爆破剂
technology.technologicalApplicability: The REO mining process described is intended for the extraction of rare earth oxides from bastnaesite-containing ore in the Bayan Obo region, located in the Southern Provinces of China. The output from this process serves as a critical resource in various high-tech industries, including electronics, renewable energy technologies, and aerospace engineering. Specifically, the rare earth elements extracted are vital components in the manufacturing of permanent magnets, batteries, catalysts, and phosphors.
此描述的稀土氧化物(REO)开采过程旨在从位于中国南方省份白云鄂博地区含氟碳铈矿的矿石中提取稀土氧化物。该过程的产出是电子、可再生能源技术和航空航天工程等高科技行业中的关键资源。具体来说，提取的稀土元素是制造永磁体、电池、催化剂和荧光粉等产品的关键组件。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).
Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCI data should consider the methodological variations and uncertainties highlighted in the comparison of the LCIA results. It is recommended to apply consistent LCIA methods when using this data set for comparative purposes. Prior to utilization, users should confirm that the assumed baseline for aqueous and gaseous emissions aligns with current standards. This data set is adapted from proxy sources such as iron and phosphate rock mining; therefore, users must factor in the inherent differences when applying the data to specific rare earth mining contexts.
此生命周期清单(LCI)数据的用户应考虑比较LCIA结果时突出的方法学变化和不确定性。建议在使用此数据集进行比较目的时应用一致的LCIA方法。在使用前，用户应确认水和气体排放的假设基线是否与当前标准一致。此数据集改编自铁矿和磷矿数据源；因此，用户在将数据应用于特定稀土开采环境时必须考虑固有差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
